mapper.select: select g.plan_code as planCode, g.full_name as planName, gb.batch_no as batchNo, g.ticket_amount as amount, de.tickets_every_group as ticketsEveryGroup from game_plans g, game_batch_import gb, game_batch_import_detail de where g.plan_code = gb.plan_code and g.plan_code = de.plan_code and de.status = 1
